content: BTW, I plan to be gone starting tomorrow (the 21) until sometime next week. I'll probably start at least reviewing PRs and things a bit on the 26th or 27th or so but may not be very around.
I also won't be around much next week
fyi triage won't do anything during the holidays
Planning to be fairly available throughout the holidays myself.
I'm expecting to do a small amount of reviewing etc starting today, but not a full day of work; will resume next week I suppose
